mapper.insert: insert into subscription(s_no, u_id, s_id) values(subscription_s_no_SEQ.nextval, #{u_id}, #{s_id})
mapper.select: select u_id, s_id, (select count(*) from subscription s1 where s1.s_id=s2.s_id) s_count from subscription s2 where u_id=#{u_id}
select s_id, (select count(*) from subscription s1 where s1.s_id=s2.s_id) s_count from subscription s2 GROUP BY s_id order by s_count desc
